overview:
Nitin Mathew is a Dubai-based marketer, with a specialty in the video game and entertainment products sector.

Between 1998 and 2010, Nitin has worked with Red Entertainment Distribution, the Middle East’s leading distributor and marketer of computer and video games.

During this time, he has worked on products from Activision Blizzard, Codemasters, Eidos Interactive, Electronic Arts, SEGA, SouthPeak Games, Take 2 Interactive, Ubisoft and Warner Bros Interactive Entertainment.

With over a decade of experience marketing interactive entertainment in the Middle East, with roles ranging from PR and advertising to media buying and event management, Nitin is now the founder and chief executive of Cygnus Communications, a company specialising in marketing and event management consultancy projects for entertainment and consumer technology brands.

Nitin has also spent brief stints in the advertising, retail and technology distribution industries.

He serves in a consultant capacity to various companies who wish to engage the power of video games to add value and excitement to their existing campaigns.

Residing in Dubai, UAE, Nitin is married with two children and is an avid technology enthusiast with a keen interest in social media and leveraging the power of human relationships.
